component.name: NowPlayingTask
component.script:
sub init() m.timer = m.top.findNode("tryAgainTimer") m.timer.ObserveField("fire","handleTimerFired") m.top.functionName = "pingServer" end sub
sub pingServer() data = { "query": "query GetNowPlaying { nowPlaying {__typename ... on Video { uri, name, url, lastPlayedEpoch } ... on Audio { uri, name, url, lastPlayedEpoch } ... on NothingPlaying { tryAgainInMin } } }" } print "Pinging server..." response = Requests().post("http://192.168.1.2:2222/graphql", {"json": data})
if (response.statuscode = 200) then res = response.json.data.nowPlaying if (res["__typename"] = "NothingPlaying") then print "There's nothing on. Trying again in " + str(res.tryAgainInMin) + " minutes..." setRetryTimer(res.tryAgainInMin) else print "There's something on: " + res.name m.top.mediaType = res["__typename"] m.top.name = res.name m.top.uri = res.uri m.top.url = res.url ' MUST BE LAST PARAM TO BE SET end if else print "Error code received: " + response.statuscode end if end sub
sub setRetryTimer(minutes) m.timer.duration = minutes * 60 m.timer.control = "start" end sub
sub handleTimerFired() m.top.control = "RUN" end sub
